title.rendered: Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes in North Delhi

content.rendered:
[vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_column_text]Are you from North Delhi and looking for some of the best digital marketing institutes in North Delhi? Nowadays, there are several options to learn digital in Delhi. However, the best option is to join the best institute for a digital marketing course in Delhi. A course will help you to learn digital marketing from basic to advanced levels. Furthermore, a mentor will always be there to guide you throughout your learning phase. Now,  to help you find the best digital marketing Institutes in North Delhi, I have curated a list of the top institutes from North Delhi that will help you upgrade and skill yourself with the best marketing techniques, trends, frameworks, and many new things to explore and learn. But before I begin with the list of the institute offering the digital marketing course in north Delhi, I would first like to take you through the various digital marketing job opportunities in Delhi that you can get.  

Digital Marketing Job Opportunities

Once you have done with the digital marketing course, you will easily be able to get digital marketing jobs in various modules like SEO, SMM, Google Adwords, Web Analytics, Content Marketer, etc. Nowadays, there are many digital marketing agencies and companies that are looking for digital marketing professionals from various fields. Now, let’s look into the various digital marketing job opportunities with their salaries that are paid to the professionals in the field of Digital Marketing.  
  • Digital Marketing Manager 
The very first job opportunity that you can get in the field of digital marketing is as a Digital Marketing Manager where your main job role will be focused on the planning, development, implementation, and management of the overall company digital strategy. Once you have got into the job role of a digital marketing manager you can easily earn an annual salary of approx Rs. 4.7 lacs.
  • SEO Specialists
As reported by SEOTribunal.com, Google handles 3.8 million searches per minute on an average across the globe. Therefore, from the above stats, we can see that with the continuous increase in the daily search the demand for SEO specialists is also increasing day by day. So as an SEO Specialist you will be required to analyze, suggest and implement the organization’s website so that it can be optimized for the search engines so that it can be easily ranked. Also, you will be required to implement keyword research, On-page SEO, Off- Page and Technical SEO where you will be able to get a minimum salary range from Rs. 1LPA to Rs. 4 LPA and for an annual salary of an experienced candidate will range from Rs. 1.9 Lacs.
  • Social Media Marketer
As most people are using social media platforms these days, the job responsibilities of social media marketer revolve around creating content, promoting products and services, scheduling social media posts, interacting with customers, developing new social media strategies, and running marketing campaigns over various social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, and Snapchat. So, if you begin your career as a Social Media Marketer, you will easily be able to earn a starting average salary of Rs. 3. 5 LPA.
  • Web Analyst/Data Analyst
Web Analysts and Data Analysts are part of the Web Development team. The main responsibilities of these professionals are data management, data analysis, web projects, data integrity, and web server security. The salary range of a Web Analyst/Data Analyst is ₹1.8–6.6 LPA. The average salary of an experienced candidate is ₹3.6 LPA.
  • Content Marketer
As a Content Marketer, you will be responsible for creating various content like blog posts, social media posts, guest posts, etc to engage your targeted audience. The salary offered to you will range from Rs. 3.7 LPA to Rs. 10 LPA. Once you have acquired enough experience in the field of content writing and marketing you will get an annual salary of around Rs. 6.4 Lacs. Now that I have provided you with the various career job opportunities in Digital Marketing, here are some of the top 10 Digital Marketing Courses in North Delhi that pioneers in teaching their best tenets to their wards. Also in case, if you are living in any other part of Delhi, you can still enroll for the best digital marketing course in Delhi while living in different parts of the city. Here is the link to the top digital marketing institutes in Delhi, Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes In North Delhi Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes In South Delhi Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes In Central Delhi Top 30+ Digital Marketing Institutes In Delhi

Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes in North Delhi

 

1. Digiperform

Digierform is one of the best digital marketing institutes in North Delhi and is Headquartered in Noida, Digiperform is one of the most trusted & leading brands in Digital Marketing Training that has trained over 24,000+ digital marketing professionals from all over India. In today’s scenario, when digital marketing has become the most essential skill for everyone, Digiperform with its well-structured curriculum designed in LMS provides its trainees with the learning of all the various modules in digital marketing that helps its trainees to become an expert in the field of Digital Marketing. Being in the industry for more than 9 years, Digiperform with its highly considerable placement cell has helped many of its trainees to start with their Digital Marketing careers. To feel enchanted, Digiperform has been featured in well known online magazines – Yourstory Media – has featured an article under the title “Edtech start-up Digiperform raises $ 3.6 M from HT Media” stating the recent achievements and how excited they are to make the most of the same investment to pick up the pace of growth in the market and build huge brand awareness in the market. With the change in the education sector, where most of the institutes and organizations are coming online to provide educational content to their customers and students, Digiperform has effectively launched its Online course for its students through which the students can easily learn and upgrade their digital marketing skills. Now let discuss the Digiperform Course Curriculum:
Course Types:
Digiperform Certified Online Marketing Professional Course (dCOMPro) Digiperform Certified Online Marketing Practitioner(dCOMP) Digiperform Certified Digital Marketing Planner (dCDMP)
Course Syllabus & Modules
Digiperform offers its Certified Online Marketing Professional Course with its 25+ Modules i.e
  • Marketing & Web Presence Foundation Module ( 5 Modules)
  • Online Business Visibility Creation (6 Modules )
  • Lead Generation (5 Modules)
  • Lead Nurturing (4 Modules)
  • Personal Branding & Online Earning (4 Modules)
  • Interview Preparation (1 Module)
  • 8 Masterclass
  • 3 Capstone Projects With 9 Specialization Badges
 
Course Highlights
  • 100% Job Assistance
In today’s world, when you can a lot of Competitive & everyone needs a secure job for their future. Digiperform is the only digital marketing institute that provides you with 100% job assistance to their trainees. So, while choosing the digital marketing course from Digiperform, you don’t have to worry about the job placement as they fulfill what they promise.
  • Tools based Learning
With the advancement of technology where every single thing is handled with the tools and software, Digiperform is the only training company that will enable you to get the experience to learn and handle 100+ live tools which are most commonly used by the marketing professionals and experts over the years.
  • Live Practical Sessions
To make you understand digital marketing more effectively, Digiperform provides you with live training sessions that will help you to understand the topic easily whenever required.
  • Industry’s Top Trainers
Learning digital marketing from the best industry experts is like a blessing, at Digiperform you will be get trained by the top industry professionals/trainers who will support you at every problem to achieve excellence in all parameters such as SEO, SMM, PPC, Social Media Marketing, Email Marketing, Google Ads and Affiliate Marketing, etc to meet your desired goals.
  • Free Doubt Session and Backup Classes
At Digiperform, you will get an opportunity to ask the right questions about the marketing anytime in the doubt session, also with it in case you have missed any of your classes Digiperform trainers will provide you with the backup class for the same.
  • Weekday/ Weekend/ Sunday Only Batch
Keeping in mind the busy schedule, Digiperform has provided its trainees with the special flexible time to provide training, where you can join the course according to your convenience and simultaneously engage with your business and other activities while taking the course.
  • PAN India Presence 
With the efficient growth of Digiperform, it has covered almost every city across Asia with the major aim to provide the knowledge of digital marketing to every individual. To date, it has almost 40+ centers making its presence all over India.
  • Award-Winning LMS 
To help its trainees learn digital marketing, it provides you with the best curriculum, certification, and 24*7 LMS designed for its trainees where you will easily get the course PPT’s, recording quizzes, self- half tutorials, and forums available only to the registered students for getting answers to all queries related to marketing.
  • Affordable Fees Structure 
It provides you with the fee structure that you can easily afford as compared to that of its competitors. Whether you are an Under-graduates, graduate, working professional, freelancer, housewife, or entrepreneur, you can easily afford the price for the course given to you at Digiperform to make a winning career.
  • High Quality of Training 
All the training modules provided to you at Digiperform are highly concerned about the quality where you will get the various training modules provided you are by the industry experts to make sure that it meets all major industry standards. Also, you will always get the latest skills and new technologies in the digital marketing industry.
  • Makes you an expert in the Digital domain
Once you have completed the digital marketing course from Digiperform, you will be able to apply for the job in big organizations and reputed ad agencies. Also, the major benefit that you will get after completing the course is that you will be able to choose multiple areas of digital marketing as per your skills and interest. Who can do this Course? 
  • Student & Jobseeker
If you are a student and looking forward to starting your career, pursuing the digital marketing course will be the best option for you as it will help you get the job in the various details with a high salary package.
  • Marketing Sales and Professionals
With the help of a digital marketing professional course, you will be easily able to upskill yourself for a better salary and career opportunities in the various digital marketing modules like SEO, SMM, Online Advertising, Google Analytics, Sales Optimization & Online Earning.
  • Business Owners and Entrepreneurs 
As a business owner and entrepreneur, with the help of digital marketing courses, you can grow your business and boost your revenue at a fast pace. Along with it, you can also target the most desired audience that you have set for your business.
  • Digital Marketing Professionals 
Although, if you are already a digital marketing individual with the help of a digital marketing course you can easily upgrade your existing skills and knowledge.
  • Housewives and Freelancers
If you are a homemaker to earn the extra income while sitting at home then enrolling in the digital marketing course will be the most advantageous step for you as here you can easily provide your digital marketing services to various clients from all around the world as well as you can also build your brand, earn as an affiliate marketer, make money with blogging, and start your own eCommerce business that will help you earn the huge income from home.  

Reasons Why You Should Join Digiperform?

Here are some of the happy reviews of our trainees that will help you to make a better choice for choosing the digital marketing course:   View More: Digiperform Best Reviews   

2. Institute of Marketing Communications India

Institute of marketing communications India is among the popular digital marketing institutes in North Delhi and registered under The Societies Registration Act and recognized by the Department of Industrial Policy & Promotion. The idea behind starting IMCI is to increase the brand value by teaching the various ways of how you can easily increase the value of the brand you promote. At IMCI, the courses available are concerned with Digital Marketing, Advertising, and Journalism where you will get the varied course that is regularly innovated as per the current situation in the industry and ensures you about the capability and deliverance at equal rates.
Course Types:
Certified Digital Marketing Professional (CDMP)
  • Full-Time Class Room Programmes
* Part-Time Class Room programs (Weekend classes) * Distance & Online mode (Comprehensive study material along with e-lectures)
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Advertising and Public Relations
  • Digital Marketing
  • Creative Communication
  • Mass Communication
  • Marketing & Brand Direction
  • E-Commerce Management
  • Sales and Marketing Management
  • Product Management
  • Digital Journalism
  • Event Management
  • Media Management
 

3. Excel Range Media

Excel Range Media is listed in the top digital marketing institutes in North Delhi. Being the full-service digital marketing professional institute for advanced digital marketing, graphic & web designing course. Excel Range Media is committed to transforming the career of the students for the better and high-quality training to the students.
Course Type:
  • Digital Marketing Professional Program
Course Syllabus & Modules:
  • Social media marketing
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Google Ads
  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Email Marketing
  • Content Marketing
  • Inbound & Outbound Marketing
  • Mobile Marketing
  • Influencer Marketing
Course Highlight:
  • Small Batch
  • Learn & Intern Program
  • Certified Course & Experience Letter Against Internship
  • Flexible Time Slots with weekdays & weekend Batches
  • Round the Clock Assistance to students
 

4. Digital Marketing School Network

Founded in the year 2016, Digital Marketing School Network is India’s first network for digital marketing training across the country that provides you with the CRC training for job seekers and working professionals and training for entrepreneurs / Business owners. Digital Marketing School Network stands out of the crowd for various reasons and you will explore other reasons for DMSN to be in the top digital marketing institutes in North Delhi. With the headquarters based in Delhi, DMSN has trained over 12000+ fresh graduates, professionals, and entrepreneurs to fill the gap that exists in today’s education sector and provide technology-driven learning for the youth and to those who think learning is the basis of progress. DMSN for its trainees has a dedicated online student information system(SIS) that provides you with a lot of things such as accessing online tutorials & learning materials, marketing attendance, checking assessment scores, and so on, also the company has its Test assessment software. As far as the trainers are concerned at the DMSN, they only have Industry experts and thought leaders as their trainers that help the learners to build a digital career for themselves. To work in real-time projects, it helps its candidates with the digital marketing troubleshooting skills that let its trainees work in the live environment but also provide you with the free software so that you can get the right exposure to working in the industry during the training itself.
Course Type:
  • Digital Marketing Classroom Course
  • Digital Marketing Online Course
Course Syllabus and Modules
  • Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
  • Search Engine Marketing
  • Social Media Marketing (SMM)
  • Email Marketing
  • Inbound Marketing
  • Web Analytics
  • Online reputation management
  • Retargeting management
  • Lead Generation strategy
Course Highlights:
  • Details of 65+ Modules with 18+ certifications
  • Hands-on training with live paid projects
  • Certified and expert trainers from industry
  • Best records of placement
  • Earn while you learn
 

5. Your web SEO

Your Web SEO is a leading digital marketing institutes in North Delhi and launched in the year 2012, Your Web SEO is among one of the oldest digital marketing institutes in Pitampura, which provides you with the advanced digital marketing certification course divided into 60 Modules. The course at Your Web SEO provides you with the best practical knowledge that help will help you create an industry leader and grow you as an expert in digital marketing to make your job secure in any company or to start with your own business. Also, the major benefits that you will get here are paid and unpaid internships for 2 months depending on the student’s capabilities.
Course Type:
  • Advance Digital Marketing Course
  • Master Digital Marketing Course
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Search Engine Optimization,
  • Internet Marketing,
  • Conversion Optimization,
  • Growth Hacking,
  •  Keyword Research,
  • Online Reputation Management,
  • Mobile marketing,
  • Social Media Marketing.
Course Highlights
  • Over 3500+ Students Trained
  • 15+ Years of Expertise in Digital Marketing
  • Student loans at 0% cost
  • Learn from Digital Marketing Professionals
  • Hands-on Training
  • Live project training and 2 Months of Internship
  • 60+ Digital Marketing Modules
  • 1-on-1 Coaching Included
  • Customize Training Course
  • 100% Placement Assistance Guarantee
 

6. Course Crown

Course Crown is a one-stop destination where you will find professional trainers and tutors, that will help you to make a master in digital marketing. Let’s explore the course types and modules that will give you a brief, why Course Crown is in the best digital marketing institutes in North Delhi. The advanced digital marketing training program will provide you with all the basic aspects of the digital marketing course. This covers website creation and planning, Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Marketing along with generating leads via paid advertising.
Course type
  • Digital Marketing Certification Program
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Digital Marketing Framework
  • SEO
  • PPC
  • Google Analytics
  • SMO
  • Website planning & Creation
  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Google webmaster
  • Content Marketing
  • Email Marketing, etc.
Course Highlights
  •  Gain an Understanding of Today’s Digital Marketing Industry
  •  Identify key essentials that influence the online consumer.
  •  Plan and Develop a Digital Marketing Campaign
  •  Assess online Analytics & Measurement.
  •  Learn team roles and Responsibilities in the Campaign Process.
  •  Understand the use of Digital Marketing tools, Strategies, and tactics.
  •  Best Practices and future trends of Online Marketing.
 

7. Digital Hikes

Being one of the most reputed names in the digital industry and worked with some of the best-known brands in the world. Digital Hikes has made a unique space for itself in this highly competitive market. At Digital Hikes, here you will get several ways to know why Digital Hikes is among the popular digital marketing institutes in North Delhi. You will be trained by experienced mentors where each student will be individually guided, trained, and monitored.
Course type
  • Digital Marketing Training Course
Course Highlights
  •  6 Month comprehensive course
  • One on One Mentorship
  • Limited Students
  • Stipend
 

8. Expert SEO Training Institute

Expert SEO Training Institute is well established from very early. You can say, it is enough for it to be in the top digital marketing institutes in North Delhi. Started in 2012 by Mrx Udit Khurana, the expert training institute provides a flexible learning place and has trained more than 30,000 candidates in over 1973 batches. With 100% placement support and 10+ live projects, an expert training institute with one-to-one mentoring offers a digital marketing course certificate after completing the class.
Course Types:
  • Digital Marketing Course
  • SEO Course
  • PPC Course
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Digital Marketing Overview
  • Website Designing Overview
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Pay Per Click
  • Social Media Optimization
  • Advance Google Analytics
  • Mobile Marketing
  • Ecommerce Marketing & etc.
Course Fee: Rs. 6,999/-
Course Highlights
  • Live Class Videos
  • Flexible Batches
  • Doubt Session Class
  • Lifetime Assistance
  • 24*7 Support
 

9. Digital Academy

Since 2013, Digital Academy provides you with digital marketing training to corporate, professionals & freshers who are willing to start their career in Digital Marketing. Now, you will explore below, why Digital Academy is of the best digital marketing institutes in North Delhi? At Digital Academy, you will get an in-depth knowledge of digital marketing with its various modules where you will be able to get the practical knowledge and real-life practices to grow your business and career in the digital world. With the latest techniques happening in digital marketing, the digital academy provides you with the knowledge of the latest SEO tips & tricks, best industry practices that will help you to increase leads and queries, enhance your business, and build a strong brand over some time.
Course Type
  • Digital Marketing Specialization Program
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • SEO (Search Engine Optimisation)
  • SEM (Search Engine Marketing)
  • Content Marketing
  • Referral Marketing
  • E-Mail Marketing
  • Mobile Marketing
  • Social Media Marketing
 

10. Adzentrix Training

Being awarded as one of the best digital marketing training institutes in Delhi, Adzentrix provides you with the practical & most advanced digital marketing training for its various aspirants & professionals. Adzentrix is one of the top digital marketing institutes in North Delhi. With 14 years of experience in digital marketing and a passion for providing world-class education, Adzentrix offers diversified training programs that not only focus on quality but also constantly strive to provide you with phenomenal programs such as SEO, PPC, and digital marketing training as per your expectations.
Course Types:
  • Advance Digital Marketing Course
Course Syllabus & Modules
  • Search Engine Optimization
  • Website Fundamentals
  • Pay-Per-Click Marketing
  • Content Marketing
  • Web Designing on WordPress
  • Email Marketing
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Affiliate Marketing
  • Google Webmasters
  • Google Analytics
  • Youtube Marketing
Course Highlights
  • Micro-Sized batches
  • Google Certified & Exp. Trainers
  • 4.9/5 Ratings on Google
  • Life Time Career Support
  • 100% Job Assistance
  • 14+ Years of Experience
 

Conclusion

I hope the article on the topic Top 10 Digital Marketing Institutes In North Delhi helped you to get detailed information about the various digital marketing courses in Delhi. No wonder digital marketing is one of the fastest-growing modes of promotion and the easiest way to associate with your customers. So if you are graduates, undergraduates, professionals, business owners, entrepreneurs, or housewive, it is the right time for you to enroll in the digital marketing course as it will help you to get a well-established career in the digital marketing industry. This is all about the best digital marketing institutes in North Delhi and you may comment below for any query. We will be glad to assist you at our earliest.
